data.title: 18. “A Mass of Contradictions”: Michael Curtiz and the Women’s Film
data.meta_description: 18. “A Mass of Contradictions”: Michael Curtiz and the Women’s Film was published in The Many Cinemas of Michael Curtiz on page 249.
